channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 10:28 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city Marganets and the Marganets territorial community are under artillery fire. Take shelter!
item.description: 🔴 10:28 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city Marganets and the Marganets territorial community are under artillery fire. Take shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 10:12 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in: - Myrivska territorial community - Nikopol city and Nikopol territorial community - Chervonogryhorivska territorial community
item.description: 🟡 10:12 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in: - Myrivska territorial community - Nikopol city and Nikopol territorial community - Chervonogryhorivska territorial community #Dnipropetrovsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 10:00 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291
item.description: 🟠 10:00 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291#Kupyanskyi_rayon This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 09:35 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community has been eliminated. Please note that the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
